title.value: Допустимый уровень воздействия ходовых систем сельскохозяйственной техники на почву
Permissible level of the influence of running system of agricultural equipment on soil
Permissible level of the influence of running system of agricultural equipment on soil

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Chechetkin, A.D., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: The problem of the influence of the running system of agricultural equipment on soil during cultivation process is analyzed. Historical analysis of different types of tractors, used since 20-th years of previous century is presented. Admissible norms of the influence of driving machine according the standard documentation are calculated. Standard documentation on the restriction of the level of the influence of running systems of agricultural machinery on the soil is analyzed. The assessment of indicators of the influence on the Belarus tractors is given. Corrections to the maximal indexes of pressure level according the standard documentation are suggested. Norms of maximal pressures on soil for 4x4 tractors are presented. The results of field researches on determination of the properties of the soil are given in traces of running systems with admissible level of influence.
